mapper.insert: insert into WISDOM.USER_U (USER_ID, USER_CODE, USER_NAME, USER_PWD, USER_BIRTHDAY) values (#{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userBirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select USER_ID, USER_CODE, USER_NAME, USER_PWD, USER_BIRTHDAY from WISDOM.USER_U
